MajorClaims.Text: it is essential for people, especially young ones, to possess the ability to plan and organize
the ability to plan and organize is undoubtedly a powerful and sharp weapon that we must be armed with

Claims.Text: it can improve the efficiency and reduce the crisis of our actions
great planning and organizing ability is able to cause our actions more efficient and productive
the capacity to plan and organize also help young people to eliminate the crisis in their actions, which may ruin one's whole effort over a very long time
it is not need for young people to possess this ability
In this complex society, we, young people, are encompassed with multiple tasks

Premises.Text: Take myself as an example, I used to be overwhelmed by the burden of preparing for the final exam, submitting my paper, and finishing my internship work at the end of each term

Yet, in this year, following the suggestion of my roommate, John, I make a to-do list to plan and organize perfectly everything I should get done in the final and hence take every tasks and trivials into control
This plan ability helps me a lot, making me climb to the top rank of the class while finishing everything else
the employees in every company have to create profit as much as they can for their supervisors and complete their assignments perfectly
If some employees lack the ability to plan and organize ahead, they may get the procrastination and therefore take into action until the deadline is imminent
those employees who did not plan and finish their assignments ahead of time perhaps are unable to finish these tasks on time and therefore will be penalized or get fired
Every employee can not afford this kind of loss
the deadline of task is shifted to an earlier date for the change of company's schedule
the ability to plan and organize can be learned until obtaining a job
this ability is also essential for young people
young people can overcome their bad habits and fulfill their goals more quickly with this ability
As searching information on the internet, young people are probably distracted by other attractions such as online games or social webs
they would surf on the internet for hours and end up no where
It is obviously a huge waste of time
if they make their plan in the first place, and then stick to their plans, they could get their work done quickly beyond their imagination
